data.actual_result: What happens is that when you switch to another chat/server the animation will finish in the new chat.
data.expected_result: What should happen is that when you switch to a new chat it cancels the scroll animation instead of continuing.
data.short_description: When you scroll down and switch to another chat the scroll animation finishes in the new chat.
data.steps_to_repro: - You must find a chat and scroll up a little to give yourself room to scroll. Second- Scroll down like you normally would. Third- While the screen is scrolling down switch to another server.
